name: PHPharo
tagline: PHPharo (PHP Pharaoh) is A Non-MVC Full Featured Framework That Makes You Create Any Type Of App(s) Even Sub-Apps
body:
> PHP Pharaoh is an oop modular non-mvc full featured framework that makes you create any app(s) with it

* Very Light
* Very Small
* Full Featured
* Modular
* Powerful Router full customizable 
* Powerful Helpers (output, html (there is function to fix the buffer to html5 w3c)...)
* Advanced Output Management
* Built For Seo, Speed, ..... etc
![PHP Pharaoh Welcome Page](http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/9887/wd1t.png)
![PHP Pharaoh Error Pages](http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/3092/jwy8.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
